data.text: @Marceline1 @TODAYshow The radio played Bridge Over Troubled Water at 6.30am after I had spent the entire night working on a history essay. The world needed - and still does - comforting. #NeverForget911

@Marceline1 @TODAYshow I was sitting here at my desktop at home. 3 sons at school. Now one son has retired from the Air Force after 11 years, another son still in the Army. two deployments to A-stan. 3 DILs and 7 grands. @mikeroweworks 's story still makes me cry. Heroes on Flight 93. Heroes.
